Scripts.Text:
#define MODE var.1
#define CURRENT_EVIDENCE var.2
#define SCROLLING_DIR var.3
#define FINISHED_SHOWING_EVIDENCE var.4
#define NEXT_EVIDENCE var.5
#define PREV_EVIDENCE var.6
#define EVIDENCE_MSG var.7
#define EVIDENCE_PROGRESS var.8
#define EVIDENCE_NEW_INDEX var.9
#define THINKING_MUS_DIR var.10

#define MODE_EVIDENCE 0
#define MODE_PROFILES 1
#define MODE_PRESENT 2

#define DIRECTION_RIGHT 0
#define DIRECTION_LEFT 1

#define OBJ_COURT_CONTROLLER 10

proc TryShowEvidence Message Index Progress Next Previous
    EVIDENCE_MSG = Message
    EVIDENCE_NEW_INDEX = Index
    EVIDENCE_PROGRESS = Progress
    SET LABEL_TO_VAR Previous PREV_EVIDENCE
    SET LABEL_TO_VAR Next NEXT_EVIDENCE
    goto ShowEvidence
endproc

// ======================================== INIT

SCROLLING_DIR = DIRECTION_RIGHT
FINISHED_SHOWING_EVIDENCE = 0
CURRENT_EVIDENCE = -1
EVIDENCE_NEW_INDEX = IDX_ATTORNEYBADGE

// ======================================== EVIDENCE
LblAttorneyBadge:
::TryShowEvidence AttorneyBadge IDX_ATTORNEYBADGE EVIDENCE_START LblPictograph LblIngoClothes
LblPictograph:
::TryShowEvidence MalonPictograph IDX_MALONPICTOGRAPH EVIDENCE_GOTPHOTO LblAutopsy LblAttorneyBadge
LblAutopsy:
::TryShowEvidence Autopsy IDX_AUTOPSY EVIDENCE_GOTAUTOPSY LblSaw LblPictograph
LblSaw:
::TryShowEvidence PoacherSaw IDX_POACHERSAW EVIDENCE_GOTSAW LblPerfume LblAutopsy
LblPerfume:
::TryShowEvidence Perfume IDX_PERFUME EVIDENCE_GOTPERFUME LblCloth LblSaw
LblCloth:
::TryShowEvidence BloodyCloth IDX_BLOODYCLOTH EVIDENCE_GOTCLOTH LblOilBottle LblPerfume
LblOilBottle:
::TryShowEvidence OilBottle IDX_OILBOTTLE EVIDENCE_GOTOILBOTTLE LblRanchInherit LblCloth
LblRanchInherit:
::TryShowEvidence RanchInheritance IDX_RANCHINHERITANCE EVIDENCE_GOTINHERITANCE LblIngoClothes LblOilBottle
LblIngoClothes:
::TryShowEvidence IngoClothes IDX_INGOCLOTHES EVIDENCE_GOTINGOCLOTHES LblAttorneyBadge LblRanchInherit

// ======================================== PROFILES
LblMalon:
::TryShowEvidence Malon IDX_MALON EVIDENCE_START LblTalon LblIngo
LblTalon:
::TryShowEvidence Talon IDX_TALON EVIDENCE_START LblJudge LblMalon
LblJudge:
::TryShowEvidence Judge IDX_JUDGE EVIDENCE_GOTJUDGE LblDragmire LblTalon
LblDragmire:
::TryShowEvidence Dragmire IDX_DRAGMIRE EVIDENCE_GOTDRAGMIRE LblImpa LblJudge
LblImpa:
::TryShowEvidence Impa IDX_IMPA EVIDENCE_GOTIMPA LblZelda LblDragmire
LblZelda:
::TryShowEvidence Zelda IDX_ZELDA EVIDENCE_GOTZELDA LblIngo LblImpa
LblIngo:
::TryShowEvidence Ingo IDX_INGO EVIDENCE_GOTINGO LblMalon LblZelda

ShowEvidence:
    if EVIDENCE < EVIDENCE_PROGRESS
        CURRENT_EVIDENCE = -1
        if SCROLLING_DIR == 0
            goto NEXT_EVIDENCE
        else
            goto PREV_EVIDENCE
        endif
    endif

    if CURRENT_EVIDENCE != EVIDENCE_NEW_INDEX
        FINISHED_SHOWING_EVIDENCE = 0
        close_textbox
        show_textbox_sp EVIDENCE_MSG
        await frames 10
        CURRENT_EVIDENCE = EVIDENCE_NEW_INDEX
    endif

    if EVIDENCE == EVIDENCE_START and MODE != MODE_PROFILES
        ::setUIArrows GUI_ARROWS_NONE
    else
        ::setUIArrows GUI_ARROWS_BOTH
    endif

set SCRIPT_START HERE

    FINISHED_SHOWING_EVIDENCE = 1

    if BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_DLEFT or STICK_X <= -20
        await frames 3
        if MODE == MODE_EVIDENCE and EVIDENCE == EVIDENCE_START
            PLAY SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_SY_ERROR
        else
            PLAY SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_SY_WIN_SCROLL_LEFT
            SCROLLING_DIR = DIRECTION_LEFT
            goto PREV_EVIDENCE
        endif
    elif BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_DRIGHT or STICK_X >= 20
        await frames 3
        if MODE == MODE_EVIDENCE and EVIDENCE == EVIDENCE_START
            PLAY SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_SY_ERROR
        else
            PLAY SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_SY_WIN_SCROLL_RIGHT
            SCROLLING_DIR = DIRECTION_RIGHT
            goto NEXT_EVIDENCE
        endif
    endif

    if CURRENT_EVIDENCE == IDX_MALONPICTOGRAPH and BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_A
        CLOSE_TEXTBOX

        ::setUIArrows GUI_ARROWS_NONE
        PLAY SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_SY_FSEL_DECIDE_L
        ::setUIStyle GUI_PHOTO_EVIDENCE
        await BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_B
        PLAY SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_SY_FSEL_CLOSE

        if MODE == MODE_EVIDENCE
            ::setUIStyleArrows GUI_COURTRECORD_EVIDENCE GUI_ARROWS_BOTH
        else
            ::setUIStyleArrows GUI_CROSS_EXAMINATION_EVIDENCE GUI_ARROWS_BOTH
        endif

        show_textbox_sp MalonPictograph
    endif

    if textbox_on_screen true and textbox_drawing false and FINISHED_SHOWING_EVIDENCE = 1
        if MODE == MODE_EVIDENCE and BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_R
            ::setUIStyleArrows GUI_COURTRECORD_PROFILES GUI_ARROWS_BOTH
            MODE = MODE_PROFILES
            PLAY SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_SY_FSEL_DECIDE_L
            goto LblMalon
        elif MODE == MODE_PROFILES and BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_R
            ::setUIStyle GUI_COURTRECORD_EVIDENCE
            MODE = MODE_EVIDENCE
            PLAY SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_SY_FSEL_DECIDE_L
            goto LblAttorneyBadge
        elif MODE == MODE_PRESENT and BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_CUP
            set ext_var OBJ_COURT_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_PLAYER_PRESENTED = CURRENT_EVIDENCE
            close_textbox
            kill self
        elif BUTTON_PRESSED BTN_B
            ::setUIStyle GUI_NONE
            PLAY SFX_GLOBAL NA_SE_SY_FSEL_CLOSE
            await frames 5
            kill self
        endif
    endif
Scripts.Name: ShowEvidence

Messages.Name: AttorneyBadge
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:LIGHT_MEDALLION><G>Attorney's Badge<W>
Proof that I can stand in
court as an attorney.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: MalonPictograph
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:PRESCRIPTION><G>Malon's Pictograph<W>
A childhood photo of Malon with
her father. Press <B><A Button><W> to view.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Autopsy
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:ZELDAS_LETTER><G>Autopsy Report<W>
"Deep slash with a sharp object.
Victim died from loss of blood
around 9:30 AM."<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: PoacherSaw
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:POACHERS_SAW><G>Saw<W>
Supposed murder weapon.
Bears no bloodstains.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Perfume
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:EYEDROPS><G>Perfume Bottle<W>
Found at the crime scene.
Ranch's gift for the visiting
princess.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: BloodyCloth
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:ODD_POTION><G>Bloodied Cloth<W>
Found held by Malon at the
crime scene. Stained with blood.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: OilBottle
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:EMPTY_BOTTLE><G>Oil Bottle<W>
Found at the ranch near a
burned-out fire. Has a tiny bit
of oil inside.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: RanchInheritance
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:CLAIM_CHECK><G>Ranch Inheritance Document<W>
"My daughter Malon will inherit
the ranch. If she is unable, divide
the deed between Crown and Ingo."<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: IngoClothes
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:GORON_TUNIC><G>Ingo's Clothes<W>
Ingo usually wears his work 
clothes around the ranch.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Malon
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:DEKU_STICK><G>Malon<W>
Age: 21
My longtime friend and the
defendant in this case.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Dragmire
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:DEKU_NUT><G>Ganondorf Dragmire<W>
Age: 57
Prosecutor assigned to the case.
Rude to others, easily angered.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Judge
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:BOOMERANG><G>Judge<W>
Age: ??
Jolly old man who has presided
over some of my cases.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Impa
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:BOW><G>Impa<W>
Age: 29
Homicide detective assigned to
Malon's case. A good soul.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Zelda
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:BEANS><G>Princess Zelda<W>
Age: 14
Heir apparent to the royal throne.
Witnessed the murder.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Ingo
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:DINS_FIRE><G>Ingo<W>
Age: 44
Smarmy man who works at
the Lon Lon Ranch.<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Talon
Messages.MessageText:
<DI><ICON:SLINGSHOT><G>Talon<W>
Age: 47
Malon's father and the victim
in this case.<PERSISTENT>

Scripts.Text:
#define THINKING_ACTIVE var.1
#define LAST_MUS var.2
#define DUR_FADEOUT var.3
#define DUR_FADEIN var.4

DUR_FADEOUT = 25
DUR_FADEIN = 15
LAST_MUS = -1
THINKING_ACTIVE = 0
set script_start here

set ref_actor npcmaker 50

if ref_actor_exists
    THINKING_ACTIVE = 1
else
    if THINKING_ACTIVE != 0
        THINKING_ACTIVE = 0
        ccall NpcM_FadeOutOfThinkingMusic
    endif
endif
Scripts.Name: ThinkingFadeOut

Scripts.Text:
#define THINKING_ACTIVE var.1
#define LAST_MUS var.2
#define DUR_FADEOUT var.3
#define DUR_FADEIN var.4

start:

if THINKING_ACTIVE = 1
    await frames 60
    if THINKING_ACTIVE = 1
        ccall NpcM_FadeIntoThinkingMusic
        THINKING_ACTIVE = 2
    endif
endif
Scripts.Name: ThinkingFadeIn

#define actor.scaleZ actorf.0x58

GlobalHeaders.Name: Definitions

GlobalHeaders.Text:
proc basic_talk textbox
    talk textbox
        set talk_mode true
        set animation 0
        face self towards player
        await talking_end
        set talk_mode false
    endtalk
endproc


proc talk_with_anim textbox talk_animation
    talk textbox
        set talk_mode true
        set animation talk_animation
        face self towards player
        await talking_end
        set animation 0
        set talk_mode false
    endtalk
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setUIStyle style
    set ref_actor actor_id 1
    set UIACTOR_SELECTEDUI = style
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setUIStyleArrows style arrows
    set ref_actor actor_id 1
    set UIACTOR_SELECTEDUI = style
    set UIACTOR_ARROWS = arrows
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setUIArrows arrows
    set ref_actor actor_id 1
    set UIACTOR_ARROWS = arrows
endproc
GlobalHeaders.Name: Macros

GlobalHeaders.Text:
#define EVIDENCE_START 0
#define EVIDENCE_GOTMALON 1
#define EVIDENCE_GOTPHOTO 2
#define EVIDENCE_GOTJUDGE 3
#define EVIDENCE_GOTDRAGMIRE 4
#define EVIDENCE_GOTIMPA 5
#define EVIDENCE_GOTAUTOPSY 6
#define EVIDENCE_GOTSAW 7
#define EVIDENCE_GOTPERFUME 8
#define EVIDENCE_GOTCLOTH 9
#define EVIDENCE_GOTZELDA 10
#define EVIDENCE_GOTOILBOTTLE 11
#define EVIDENCE_GOTINGO 12
#define EVIDENCE_GOTINGOCLOTHES 13
#define EVIDENCE_GOTINHERITANCE 14

#define IDX_ATTORNEYBADGE 0
#define IDX_MALONPICTOGRAPH 1
#define IDX_AUTOPSY 2
#define IDX_POACHERSAW 3
#define IDX_PERFUME 4
#define IDX_BLOODYCLOTH 5
#define IDX_OILBOTTLE 6
#define IDX_RANCHINHERITANCE 7
#define IDX_INGOCLOTHES 8
#define IDX_MALON 100
#define IDX_TALON 101
#define IDX_DRAGMIRE 102
#define IDX_JUDGE 103
#define IDX_IMPA 104
#define IDX_ZELDA 105
#define IDX_INGO 106
GlobalHeaders.Name: EVIDENCE_INDEXES
